live_updates: Technicians have been dispatched to resolve this issue as soon as possible. Thank you for your patience.
29484.summary: Some customers in Kelowna (North Central) are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
29484.title: Nov 22 - Kelowna (North Central) | All Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)
